description: This file defines a React component for an employer-facing candidates page within a Next.js application. It fetches and displays a list of candidates for a specific job, allowing actions like refresh, view, and invite candidates.

methods.name: CandidatesContent
methods.description: React functional component that manages candidate data fetching and rendering.

methods.name: fetchCandidates
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch candidate data from the API and handle loading and error states.
